scripts.up: docker-compose up -d && npm run update-db && npm run import-db && gulp
scripts.up-lite: docker-compose up -d && npm run import-db && gulp
scripts.view-db: docker exec -it inessence_db_1 mysql -u root --password=root client_db
scripts.import-db: docker exec -i inessence_db_1 mysql -u root --password=root client_db < ./db/backup.sql
scripts.update-db: npm run pull-db && npm run localise-db
scripts.setup-https: docker-compose up -d && npm run obtain-apache && docker-compose down && npm run set-symlinks && npm run set-certs && echo 'Init complete - Open docker-compose.yml and remove commented lines.'
scripts.set-symlinks: cd _dev/apache2/sites-enabled && ln -s ../sites-available/default-ssl.conf ./ && cd ../mods-enabled && ln -s ../mods-available/socache_shmcb.load ./ && ln -s ../mods-available/ssl.load ./ && ln -s ../mods-available/ssl.conf ./ && cd ../../../
